text: Ara yara anusarana karechila tara balabe -- ''haya, amara yadi pherata pala petama tahale amara tadera theke bicchinna karatama, yemana tara amadera theke bicchinna kareche.â€™â€™ E'ibhabe allah tadera kriyakalapa tadera dekhana tadera jan'ya tibra akseparupe. Ara tara aguna theke bahiskrta habe na.
